item.title: Future of the Left at Heaven
item.author: Clementine Walker,
item.description: It’s Wednesday night and I am at Heaven to see angry Welsh noise-rockers Future of the Left. Formed from the ashes of mclusky and Jarcrew, and now featuring Julia Ruzicka from Million Dead on bass, they are known for their heavy stop-start guitar riffs and front man Falco’s viciously delivered …
